channel.title: RSPS Project and Social Media?
channel.description:
So I'm starting my first 'serious' RSPS project of 2011(which I hope to have up and running for years to come)
I suddenly came to this, how could I take advantage of social medias? Obviously by registering my project on them!
So, my question is... Which social medias would be good?
My current picks:
1. Youtube for video sharing 2. Photobucket of image sharing 3. Facebook for advertising/updates/competitions 4. Twitter for quick updates/competitions
I'm also registered on the major RSPS communities (R-S, RL, here).
________Mitchell________
P.S. I'm also trying to figure out good layout for writing game content such as quests, questlines, plots, why/when... and that stuff.(as you see, I'm not going to download a PI and add 634 items to it, host it and profit. I'm actually working on whole new quest lines and stuff. Very much like RuneScape but bot free and stuff)
